metadata.title: CVE-2021-28038 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 5.11.3, as used withXen PV. A certain part of the netback driver lacks necessary treatment oferrors such as failed memory allocations (as a result of changes to thehandling of grant mapping errors). A host OS denial of service may occurduring misbehavior of a networking frontend driver. NOTE: this issue existsbecause of an incomplete fix for CVE-2021-26931.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-28038` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.2.0-20-generic - 6.2.0-20.20
linux-image-6.2.0-20-generic-lpae - 6.2.0-20.20
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-20-generic - 6.2.0-20.20
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-20-generic-64k - 6.2.0-20.20
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-aws - 6.2.0-1003.3
No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required
